title: Chrome Flags for Android You Should Try !
description: Updated list   Simply copy paste the following links on your browser and enabled the chrome flags.   1. New Way to Pick Photos chrome://flags/#enable-new-photo-picker  2. Block Redirects to Protect Yourself chrome://flags/#enable-framebusting-needs-sameorigin-or-usergesture  3. Change the style of your native video player chrome://flags/#enable-modern-media-controls  4. Change Download Location chrome://flags/#enable-downloads-location-change  5. Reader/Night Mode chrome://flags/ #reader-mode-heuristics  Get Chrome Home Flag back   You can reach me here  Website -  YouTube -  Facebook - Twitter -  Instagram -   Which background music did I use?   What camera do I use?  Canon 70D  What mic do I use? Blue Yeti and Video Mic pro (depends on requirement)  What tripod do I use? Manfrotto MVKBFR  What video editor do I use? Final Cut Pro  What computer do I use? iMac 2015 for editing and a ThinkPad for casual work
